articles.title: Mani Ratnam reveals Ajay Devgn is part of Ponniyin Selvan; wanted to make it first with Kamal Haasan: 'Couldn't afford…' - The Indian Express
articles.description: Mani Ratnam revealed that Ajay Devgn has lent his voice for Ponniyin Selvan 1's Hindi version's narration. The historical fiction film stars Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, Trisha, Vikram, Jayram Ravi among others.
articles.content: Mani Ratnam promoted his upcoming film Ponniyin Selvan 1 in Mumbai on Saturday. The period drama based on a historical fiction novel by Kalki Krishnamurthy, is written in Tamil, which tells the story… [+3299 chars]
